2. Installation¶

2.1. Install via pip¶

sqlitebiter can be installed via pip (Python package manager).

sudo pip install sqlitebiter

3. Dependencies¶

3.1. Python packages (mandatory)¶

Dependency python packages are automatically installed during sqlitebiter installation via pip.

  • click
  • DataPropery
  • path.py
  • pytablereader
  • SimpleSQLite

3.1.1. Google Sheets dependencies¶

Google Sheets dependency packages are required some manual installation.

  • oauth2client
  • pyOpenSSL

3.1.2. Test dependencies¶

  • pytest
  • pytest-runner
  • tox
  • XlsxWriter

3.2. Python packages (optional)¶

  • lxml (Faster HTML convert if installed)
